addonCore.label: GABLE
addonCore.summary: A Matlab Geometric Algebra tutorial prototype system, find companion tutorials at: https://staff.fnwi.uva.nl/l.dorst/GABLE/index.html
addonCore.description: This toolbox is intended to introduce you to the basic geometric elements of our 3D Geometric Algebra (vectors, bivectors and trivectors) and introduces its three basic products: the outer product, the inner product and the geometric product. Also the geometry of Geometric Algebra is implemented: projection, rejection, reflection and rotation. Amongst much more functionality and features, also quaternions are naturally subsumed within our space.
